trans-unit.source: Represents a single XML node on a document that exposes events and that can be bound to data.
trans-unit.target: 表示文档上单个 XML 节点（可公开事件并可绑定到数据）。

trans-unit.source: When you map non-repeating schema elements onto a Microsoft Office Word document at design time, Visual Studio creates an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> control for each elements that are allowed to appear only once in a document.
trans-unit.target: 当你在设计时映射到 Microsoft Office Word 文档中的非重复架构元素时，Visual Studio 将创建<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>允许出现在文档中一次每个元素的控件。

trans-unit.source: A non-repeating schema element is an element with the `maxOccurs` attribute set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 非重复架构元素是具有的元素`maxOccurs`属性设置为 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> controls can be created only in Word document-level projects at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> 在设计时，可以仅在 Word 文档级项目中创建控件。

trans-unit.source: They cannot be created at run time or in application-level projects.
trans-unit.target: 也不能在运行时或在应用程序级项目中创建。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md) and [How to: Add XMLNode Controls to Word Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnode-controls-to-word-documents.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md)和[如何： 向 Word 文档添加 XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnode-controls-to-word-documents.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user adds a new <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control to the document.
trans-unit.target: 当用户向文档添加新的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.AfterInsert> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete> events.

trans-unit.target: 代码将显示消息框，然后<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>从文档和之后删除<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>添加到文档。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.RemoveChild%2A> method to delete a node and programmatically raise the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete> event.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.RemoveChild%2A>方法来删除节点，并以编程方式引发<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.BeforeDelete>事件。

trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerNode`，其中包含一个名为的子节点`CustomerDateNode`。

trans-unit.target: 如果`InUndoRedo`参数是`true`，不应更改文档中的 XML。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext%2A> property is changed is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IBindableComponent.BindingContext%2A>属性更改通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改。

trans-unit.target: 它然后在消息框中显示的列表。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions" /> collection that represents the elements that may be valid children of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions" /> collection that represents the elements that may be valid children of the current <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestion> in an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions> collection is an item in the list of allowed XML elements at the bottom of the **XML Structure** task pane.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestion>中<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLChildNodeSuggestions>集合是允许在底部的 XML 元素的列表中的项**XML 结构**任务窗格。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerNode`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor is placed inside an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> or one of its descendent nodes, from an area outside of the context of the node.
trans-unit.target: 当光标从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 节点的上下文外的区域移入该节点或它的一个子节点内时发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter> event differs from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>事件区别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter> event is raised only when the context changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>仅上下文更改时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerNode`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cursor is moved from the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control, or one of its descendent nodes, to an area outside of the context of the original node.
trans-unit.target: 当光标从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件或它的一个子代节点移到原始节点上下文以外的区域时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> event differs from the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave>事件区别<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> event is raised only when the context changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave>仅上下文更改时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application in which the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.target: 在其中创建 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> control was created in Microsoft Office Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>在 Microsoft Office Word 中创建控件，则此属性返回的十六进制数 4d535744，它表示字符串"MSWD。"

trans-unit.source: This value can also be represented by the constant <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdConstants.wdCreatorCode>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> events.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>, <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>, and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> events.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示了事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>， <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>，和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect> events are raised, the event handlers add double lines to the borders of the selection or remove the double lines, depending on the event.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Select>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Deselect>将引发事件，事件处理程序添加到所选内容的边框的双线或删除双线，具体取决于事件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave> events are raised, the event handlers display messages that state the names of the newly selected node and the previously selected node.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextEnter>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ContextLeave>将引发事件，事件处理程序显示消息，指出新选择的节点和先前选择的节点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Provides the prefix in the schema against which to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: 提供架构中用作搜索依据的前缀。

trans-unit.source: Use the <c>PrefixMapping</c> parameter if your <c>XPath</c> parameter uses names to search for elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>XPath</c> 参数使用名称搜索元素，请使用 <c>PrefixMapping</c> 参数。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to skip all text nodes while searching for the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在搜索指定的节点时，忽略所有文本节点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to include text nodes in the search.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则在搜索中包含文本节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> collection that represents all the nodes that match the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the order in which they appear in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNodes" /> 集合，该集合表示与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的所有节点，且以出现在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件中的顺序为序。

trans-unit.source: The nodes that match the <paramref name="XPath" /> parameter in the order in which they appear in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 与 <paramref name="XPath" /> 参数匹配的节点，以在 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件中出现的顺序为序。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `FastSearchSkippingTextNodes` parameter to `false` diminishes performance, because Microsoft Office Word searches all nodes in a document for the text contained in the node.
trans-unit.target: 设置`FastSearchSkippingTextNodes`参数`false`会降低性能，因为 Microsoft Office Word 搜索文本节点中包含文档中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus" /> values that specifies whether to set the validation status error text (<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusCustom" />) or to clear the validation status error text (<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK" />).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus" /> 值之一，该值指定是设置验证状态错误文本 (<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusCustom" />) 还是清除验证状态错误文本 (<see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK" />)。

trans-unit.source: The text displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 显示给用户的文本。

trans-unit.source: Leave blank when the <c>Status</c> parameter is set to <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <c>Status</c> 参数设置为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK" /> 时保留为空。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically clear the error message as soon as the next validation event occurs on the specified node.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则在针对指定节点发生下一个验证事件后，立即自动清除错误消息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> to require running the <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.SetValidationError(Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus,System.Object@,System.Boolean)" /> method with a <c>Status</c> parameter of <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK" /> to clear the custom error text.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="false" />，则要求以 <c>Status</c> 参数 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK" /> 运行 <see cref="M:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.SetValidationError(Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus,System.Object@,System.Boolean)" /> 方法，以清除自定义错误文本。

trans-unit.source: Changes the validation error text displayed to a user for an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control and forces Microsoft Office Word to report a node as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 更改向用户显示的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件的验证错误文本，并强制 Microsoft Office Word 将节点报告为无效。

trans-unit.source: To set custom error text, use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusCustom> constant.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置自定义错误文本，请使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusCustom>常量。

trans-unit.source: Validates an individual <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control against the attached XML schema or schemas.
trans-unit.target: 根据附加的一个或多个 XML 架构验证单个 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A> method with the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A> properties to determine whether an XML element is valid according to the applied schema and what error text to display to the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A>方法替换<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A>属性来确定是否根据应用的架构有效的 XML 元素和要向用户显示哪些错误文本。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.SetValidationError%2A> method to override the schema violations with custom validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.SetValidationError%2A>方法重写具有自定义的验证错误的架构冲突。

trans-unit.source: When you run the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A> method, Microsoft Office Word populates the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document.XMLSchemaViolations%2A> collection with the XML nodes that have validation errors.
trans-unit.target: 当你运行<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A>方法，Microsoft Office Word 填充<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word._Document.XMLSchemaViolations%2A>与具有验证错误的 XML 节点的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the text value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> and validates the node by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的文本值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>并通过使用验证节点<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A> property to determine whether the node validated.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A>属性来确定节点是否验证。

trans-unit.source: If the node did not validate, then the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A> property to display the validation error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点尚未验证，则该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A>属性显示验证错误消息。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerAddress1Node`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerAddress1Node`。

trans-unit.source: If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据的架构元素类型，则验证将失败。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether an element or attribute is valid according to the attached schema.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定某一元素或特性对于附加的架构是否有效。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A> property can be one of the following <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus> values:
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A>属性可以是下列项之一<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus>值：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusCustom> indicates that the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode.SetValidationError%2A> method was used to set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A> property to a custom text string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusCustom> 指示<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode.SetValidationError%2A>方法用于设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A>为自定义文本字符串的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK> indicates an XML element or attribute is valid according to the attached schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.WdXMLValidationStatus.wdXMLValidationStatusOK> 指示 XML 元素或属性有效根据附加的架构。

trans-unit.source: While these are the only two named constants the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A> property allows, there are many more unnamed values that come from the MSXML 5.0 component included with Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这些并是仅有两个已命名的常数<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A>属性允许，有许多多未命名的来自 Microsoft Office Word 中附带的 MSXML 5.0 组件的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the text value of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> and validates the node by using the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置的文本值<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>并通过使用验证节点<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A> property to determine whether the node validated.
trans-unit.target: 然后该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationStatus%2A>属性来确定节点是否验证。

trans-unit.source: If the node did not validate, then the example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A> property to display the validation error message.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点尚未验证，则该示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.ValidationErrorText%2A>属性显示验证错误消息。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerAddress1Node`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerAddress1Node`。

trans-unit.source: If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据的架构元素类型，则验证将失败。

trans-unit.source: Gets an XML string that represents the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> in the Microsoft Office Word Open XML format.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 XML 字符串，该字符串以 Microsoft Office Word Open XML 格式表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" />。

trans-unit.source: An XML string that represents the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> in the Microsoft Office Word Open XML format.
trans-unit.target: 一个 XML 字符串，该字符串以 Microsoft Office Word Open XML 格式表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns only the XML in the document that is needed to represent the specified XML node.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只返回的 XML 中表示指定的 XML 节点所需的文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents the XML text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件中的 XML 文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the XML text in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件中的 XML 文本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.XML%2A> property is intended to be used with the following parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.XML%2A>属性应与以下参数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: `true` to return the text of the XML without the Word XML markup; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: `true` 若要返回的而不使用 Word XML 标记中; XML 文本否则为`false`。

trans-unit.source: The default is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `false`。

trans-unit.source: If you use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.XML%2A> property without specifying a parameter, it returns an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode_XMLType> object that is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.XML%2A>未指定参数的属性，它返回<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode_XMLType>不应在代码中直接使用的对象。

trans-unit.source: Optional Parameters
trans-unit.target: 可选参数

trans-unit.source: For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的信息，请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.XML%2A> property to display the XML contents of an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> with and without the Word XML markup.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode.XML%2A>属性显示的 XML 内容<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>使用和不使用 Word XML 标记。

trans-unit.source: This example assumes that the current document contains an <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> named `CustomerNode`.
trans-unit.target: 此示例假定当前文档包含<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>名为`CustomerNode`。

trans-unit.source: Populates an <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> control with data.
trans-unit.target: 使用数据填充 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not add additional <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> controls or delete unnecessary <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> controls from the document.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会添加其他<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>控件或删除不必要<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>从文档的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method updates all attributes of the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将更新的所有属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Word.XMLNode>控件。
